sentences.en: I'll tell you what happened afterward.
sentences.cn: 我告诉你后来发生了什么事。

sentences.en: "But," she said afterward to Colin, "I couldn't stop myself."
sentences.cn: “其实，”后来她对科林说，“我控制不住自己。”

sentences.en: "She is such a plain child," Mrs. Crawford said pityingly, afterward.
sentences.cn: 后来，克劳福德太太同情地说：“她长得太一般了。”
